channel.title: metastore on AirPlan - A biger solution
channel.description: Recent content in metastore on AirPlan - A biger solution

item.title: 快速启动最小环境 Hive + Hive metastore
item.description: 镜像来自：https://hub.docker.com/r/apache/hive 1 docker pull apache/hive /opt/apache-hive-3.1.2-bin/hive313 信息是先启动一个 docker run，然后 docker cp hive4:/opt/hive/conf ./ 修改 hive-site 配置
